entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SyntaxGenerator should not create a TupleTypeSyntax from an unbound generic ITypeSymbol #67341
  • EnC: switch diagnostic reporting to pull diagnostics #67339
  • Make EditAndContinueLanguageService a brokered service #67338
  • SyntaxGenerator doesn't support generation of record types #67335
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67330
  • Need to add support for `using unsafe static <Type>;` #67329
    C# 12.0
  • Inconsistent capitalisation of "Remove Unnecessary Usings" in lightbulb menu #67328
  • Record inheritdoc shows in quick info but still get CS1573 #67326
  • Inheritdoc doesn't work with path="/param[@name='<NAME>']" #67325

Closed

  • Compiler erroneously allows pointer to be used within a type-argument in a using-alias #67281
  • Add `Make property required` codefix for `CS8618` #66089
  • Null check can be simplified false positive #67193
  • Missing type arguments on method invocation with more than one type parameter produce unexpected syntax tree #67277

PullRequests

Created

  • Experimenting with compiler logs #67349
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked
  • Work around arcade parsing bug #67348
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [infra] test fixes #67347
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2137261 #67346
  • Rename codefix predefined name #67345
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Code changes to allow 'using static unsafe' #67344
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify creation of unbound generic types #67343
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve error recovery while parsing switch expressions. #67340
    Area-Compilers
  • Support generating records in syntax generator #67337
    Area-IDE
  • Cherry-pick static restore workaround #67336
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Infra] Merge main-vs-deps into source branch #67332
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Disallow pointers inside generic type-arguments unless in an unsafe context (in C#12 and beyond). #67282
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove roslyn-auth.yml #67342
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Do not use the Lsp-Misc workspace in VS scenarios #67287
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Search a smaller scope when looking for references to a local symbol #67334
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Removed 'AnalyzerOptions' reference related to 'AdditionalFiles' #65851
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Implement 'Make field/property required' codefix #67175
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Improve perf of resolving local symbol keys #67324
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Framework compilers package for SDK consumption #66206
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Better parser error recovery when encountering a open generic name. #67278
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove descendent node tracking from SyntaxEditor #67314
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #67327
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #67301
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Check count before reusing cached items in `BatchNode` #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Semantic snippets - `enum` snippet #67184
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove invalid implicit downcast #19932
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial implementation of event hookup in object initializers. #56322
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Make Document Outline computation and update asynchronous. #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Implement LSP inlay hints #67319
    Area-IDE
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67092
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Pending director approval, 17.5
  • Fixup local diagnostic classification for accessor block #67312
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Analyzer driver fixes for span-based analysis #67255
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Bump Microsoft.ServiceHub.Framework to 4.2.70-beta #67071
    Area-Infrastructure
